snippet.title: AFK Journey - Official Full Presentation (Beta Voyage Application Open Now!)
snippet.description:
Join Beta Voyage through Discord:
https://discord.com/invite/bpBtZu8xfY

AFK Journey is a free-to-play ethereal fantasy RPG coming to PC and mobile platforms. You will experience a blend of AFK gameplay with new strategic layers and storytelling set in the world of Esperia. This full presentation introduces the world setting, art style, and gameplay of AFK Journey.
AFK Journey will be released in 2024, with a limited-time Beta Voyage which runs from February 1-7.

-----------------------------------------------------
BETA VOYAGE ACCESS
🔗 https://discord.com/invite/bpBtZu8xfY
Join our Discord server and get your key now through #beta-access-giveaway
Limited keys available. Progresses are not saved. No in-app purchases. 
More details available on official Discord server.

-----------------------------------------------------
PRE-REGISTER NOW
Apple App Store
https://apps.apple.com/app/afk-journey/id1628970855
Google Play Store
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.farlightgames.igame.gp


FOLLOW US

Follow the official channels for more latest news:
Beta Voyage Test Webpage: https://betavoyage-afkjourney.farlightgames.com/
Official Website: https://afkjourney.farlightgames.com
X: https://twitter.com/AFK_Journey
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/@AFKJourneyOfficial
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/WQDs8kQpJf
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/afkjourneyofficial/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AFKJourneyOfficial/
